text: I'm doing this to save people!
This war is killing tons of people!
Yes, of course. The reality is that we are in a battlefield.
A general commands hundreds, maybe thousands of troops.
But because you, at some level...
Think of this as a game...
You can keep going, even when anyone else can't.
I don't see it as a game.
This is serious business, lives are on the line!
If I don't succeed, we're both dead, and so is the village behind us!
Just because I don't always look like it, doesn't mean I'm not serious about it.
